about.1: Hi! My full name is Lam Phu Qui.
about.2: As a computer enthusiast, although I don't know all the current technology, but I can master it quickly with my own curiosity.
about.3: In addition to the passion for computers. Understanding human psychology is also a left-hand hobby, it helps me understand myself and other people better.
about.4: So I've always wanted to create user-friendly apps to make things easy.
about.5: I think that's all, you already know a little about me. Hope to cooperate with you!
